"+t.date+"
"+t.description+"
",scheduler._table_view=!0,scheduler.set_sizes()}}function t(){var e=(scheduler._date,scheduler.get_visible_events());e.sort(function(e,t){return e.start_date>t.start_date?1:-1});for(var t="
